meanings.definition: A person in charge of a group of workers.
meanings.sent1: The chargehands at the construction site ensure everyone is working efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The chargehands organized the team to complete the project on time.
meanings.sent3: The chargehands joked that they were the 'worker whisperers' because they could always motivate the team.
meanings.sent4: The chargehands stood tall like a shepherd overseeing their flock of workers.
meanings.sent5: The chargehands' role is crucial in keeping the work crew coordinated and productive.

meanings.definition: To assign tasks or responsibilities to a group of workers.
meanings.sent1: The manager chargehands the team with different duties based on their skills.
meanings.sent2: She chargehands the cleaning crew to ensure every room was spotless.
meanings.sent3: The supervisor chargehands the team to see who could finish their tasks the fastest.
meanings.sent4: He chargehands the workers like a conductor directing a symphony.
meanings.sent5: The foreman chargehands the crew with precision to maximize efficiency.
